summary: Feature request to add a dedicated API key client option to the PHP SDK, matching the approach implemented in other SDKs like Go. Currently users can specify the Authorization header via metadata, but a dedicated ergonomic API would be more consistent across SDKs.
userImpact: Developers get a more ergonomic and consistent way to configure API key authentication across all Temporal SDKs.
proposedFix: Add a dedicated API key client option similar to the approach in SDK-Go PR #1409 and features issue #426
workaround: Users can manually set the Authorization header via metadata using withMetadata(['Authorization', ['Bearer <api-key>']])
resolutionDetails: PHP SDK 2.9.0 enabled users to specify any metadata including Authorization header, providing the necessary functionality
keyQuote: Since PHP SDK 2.9.0 users can specify any metadata, including the Authorization header.
